item.description:
Saturday Sushi Night -- NEW LOCATION!

Saturday, January 27
Ma Soba
156 Cambridge St
Beacon Hill/Boston -- 7 pm reservation but need to confirm!!
http://www.masobabost...

Fun 80's Music at 6B (nearby bar at 6 Beacon St http://www.6blounge.c...) afterwards for anyone interested in that too.... So if you'd rather join later in the nigth, let me know and I'll find the address for you too!

We keep moving locations and now adding this weekend date to help keep more people coming. As we continue to meet new people we get more and more ideas of where and what everyone wants to do. So please come and learn more about everyone and we can keep things exciting!

Once RSVPs start to come in we can make a reservation or meet in the bar (depending on group size) so please let me know as soon as you can if you're even interested or not.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: A Saturday Sushi Night --NEW LOCATION -- RSVP NOW for head count!!
